title: Tareen invites Azerbaijan Military leadership to participate in IDEAS-2022
content:
ISLAMABAD, Oct 28 (APP): Federal Minister for Defence Production Muhammad Israr Tareen extended invitation to Azerbaijan Military leadership to participate in International Defence Exhibition and Seminar (IDEAS)-2022 to be held in Karachi in November.
The invitation was extended during a meeting with Azerbaijani Ambassador Khazar Farhadov, who called on the federal minister here on Friday.
The minister welcomed the dignitary and highly appreciated the brotherly support of Azerbaijan Government to Pakistan on all international forums, including OIC and the United Nations, a news release said.
Tareen said that Pakistan was a peace-loving country, strictly believing in peaceful coexistence with all. The minister reiterated that Pakistan’s commitment to peace was evident through its major contribution to the UN peace efforts in war-torn countries in different parts of the world.
He also expressed Pakistan’s strong desire to broaden and strengthen its partnership with Azerbaijan in all fields, including defence production.
The ambassador thanked the Government of Pakistan for its cooperation in the development of Azerbaijan’s defence industry and appreciated the efforts of the Ministry of Defence Production in enhancing ties between the two countries.
